TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Logger extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger
Public MustInherit Class Logger Implements ILogger
public ref class Logger abstract : Microsoft::Build::Framework::ILogger

Docs.summary: This helper base class provides default functionality for loggers that handle events raised by the build engine. This class can only be instantiated in a derived form.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger> interface.
This class can only be instantiated in a derived form.
## Examples The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
[!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

Docs.param: The available events that a logger can subscribe to.
Docs.summary: Must be implemented by derived class to subscribe to build events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method must be overridden in the derived class to perform initialization logic and to subscribe to build events published by <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>.
## Examples The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
[!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks While a logger is free to choose the events it logs, following the verbosity guidelines creates a consistent user experience.
